DOC.brief_title: Post-Market Study Assess Outcomes Patients Treated With AFX System Compared Other EVAR Devices
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , randomize , multi-center study , intend evaluate outcome contemporary EVAR ( Endovascular Aneurysm Repair ) real world population . The study design compare anatomically stabilize AFX Endograft System reference group proximally fixate EVAR device . Patients randomize two group . Randomization 1:1 . Each investigator select one comparator device choice enrol first patient . The study sequentially evaluate non-inferiority superiority hypothesis . Up 80 site experience EVAR 800 subject participate study .
